headline: The Surging Coronavirus Finds a Federal Leadership Vacuum
snippet: The winter wave has been anticipated for months. Now that it’s here, health officials worry once again about strategy and supplies.
abstract: The winter wave has been anticipated for months. Now that it’s here, health officials worry once again about strategy and supplies.
byline: By Sheryl Gay Stolberg, Noah Weiland, Sharon LaFraniere and Andrew Jacobs

headline: Biden Implores Trump to Confront a Surging Pandemic
snippet: President Trump broke his near-total silence on the coronavirus on Friday with an appearance in the Rose Garden in which he threatened to deny New York access to a vaccine.
abstract: President Trump broke his near-total silence on the coronavirus on Friday with an appearance in the Rose Garden in which he threatened to deny New York access to a vaccine.

headline: Thanksgiving, Coronavirus, Presidential Transition: Your Weekend Briefing
snippet: Here’s what you need to know about the week’s top stories.
abstract: Here’s what you need to know about the week’s top stories.
byline: By Remy Tumin and Judith Levitt

headline: A Washington Tragedy
snippet: Hundreds of thousands of Americans have died. Coronavirus cases are surging again. There’s still no federal plan.
abstract: Hundreds of thousands of Americans have died. Coronavirus cases are surging again. There’s still no federal plan.
